summary: This bill, the Buffalo Soldiers Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2025, proposes awarding a Congressional Gold Medal to the Buffalo Soldier regiments in recognition of their service to the United States Armed Forces. The bill provides for the medal's design, awarding, and display at the National Museum of African American History and Culture. It also authorizes the creation and sale of bronze duplicates. The bill highlights the history and contributions of the Buffalo Soldiers, emphasizing their bravery, dedication, and role in shaping inclusivity within the military and American society.
